projects.title: YouTube Home Page Clone
projects.description: A responsive clone of the YouTube homepage, showcasing video thumbnails, a navigation bar, and a clean layout that mimics the original design.

projects.title: Amazon Website Clone
projects.description: An interactive clone of the Amazon shopping experience, featuring product listings, a shopping cart, and dynamic elements using JavaScript for enhanced user interaction.

projects.title: Job Listing Platform
projects.description: A modern job listing platform that allows users to browse, filter, and apply for jobs, built with React for a seamless user experience and styled with Tailwind CSS for responsiveness.

projects.title: AI-Based Note Taking App
projects.description: A mobile application that leverages AI to enhance note-taking, allowing users to organize, categorize, and retrieve notes efficiently, built with React Native and Expo for cross-platform functionality.

projects.title: To-Do List
projects.description: A simple yet effective to-do list application that enables users to add, edit, and delete tasks, built with React Native for mobile platforms and Expo for quick deployment.

projects.title: Movie Streaming Website
projects.description: A dynamic movie streaming platform that allows users to browse and watch movies, featuring a clean interface and responsive design built with React for optimal performance.
